summary.span: Provides a specialized that is optimized for loading images using Extensible Application Markup Language (XAML).

span.span: Provides a specialized that is optimized for loading images using Extensible Application Markup Language (XAML).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主要有使用可支援[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]語法及導入額外的屬性，對載入的點陣圖不由定義。 primarily exists to support [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] syntax and introduces additional properties for bitmap loading that are not defined by . 實作介面以最佳化多個屬性的初始化。 implements the interface to optimize initialization on multiple properties. 只有在物件初始化期間，才會發生屬性變更。Property changes can only occur during object initialization. 呼叫發出信號表示初始化已經開始和發出信號表示初始化已完成。Call to signal that initialization has begun and to signal that initialization has completed. 在初始化之後，屬性變更都會被忽略。After initialization, property changes are ignored. 使用建立的物件建構函式會自動初始化，而且會忽略屬性變更。 objects created using the constructor are automatically initialized and property changes are ignored. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用在[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]和程式碼。The following code examples demonstrate how to use a in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] and code. [!code-xaml[ImageElementExample#SimpleXAML2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ImageElementExample/CSharp/SimpleImageExample.xaml#simplexaml2)] [!code-xaml[ImageElementExample#SimpleXAML2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ImageElementExample/VB/SimpleImageExample.xaml#simplexaml2)] [!code-csharp[ImageElementExample#SimpleCSharp1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ImageElementExample/CSharp/SimpleImageExample.xaml.cs#simplecsharp1)] [!code-vb[ImageElementExample#SimpleCSharp1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ImageElementExample/VB/SimpleImageExample.xaml.vb#simplecsharp1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定要如果您想要關閉資料流，用來建立。Set the to if you wish to close a stream used to create the . 預設值快取選項保留資料流的存取權，直到所需的映像，以及清除作業由記憶體回收行程。The default cache option retains access to the stream until the image is needed, and cleanup is handled by the garbage collector. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定的使用程式碼。The following code example demonstrates how to set the of a by using code. summary.span: Gets or sets the height, in pixels, that the image is decoded to.

span.span: Gets or sets the height, in pixels, that the image is decoded to.

value.span: 影像解碼成的高度 (以像素為單位)。

span.span: The height, in pixels, that the image is decoded to.
The default value is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果也已經設定，則會忽略點陣圖的長寬比。If is also set, the aspect ratio of the bitmap is ignored. 如果未設定，外觀比例維持不變。If is not set, the aspect ratio remains the same. [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpeg](~/includes/tlasharptla-jpeg-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)]轉碼器原生方式將影像解碼成指定的大小; 其他轉碼器解碼依其原始大小的影像，並調整至所需大小的影像。The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpeg](~/includes/tlasharptla-jpeg-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)] codecs natively decode the image to the specified size; other codecs decode the image at its original size and scale the image to the desired size. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定使用程式碼的屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to set the property by using code. [!code-csharp[BitmapImageProps#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BitmapImageProps/CSharp/BitmapImageProps.cs#1)] [!code-vb[BitmapImageProps#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BitmapImageProps/VB/BitmapImageProps.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在調整完成後，會旋轉。Rotation is performed after scaling. 這表示，具有的映像的，則為 10，和為 5 會導致影像的寬度為 5，高度為 10。This means that an image that has a of , a of 10, and of 5 will result in an image that has a width of 5 and a height of 10. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用旋轉影像[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]和程式碼。The following code example demonstrates how to rotate an image by using [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] and code. [!code-xaml[ImageElementExample#TransformedXAML2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ImageElementExample/CSharp/TransformedImageExample.xaml#transformedxaml2)] [!code-csharp[ImageElementExample#TransformedCSharp1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ImageElementExample/CSharp/TransformedImageExample.xaml.cs#transformedcsharp1)] [!code-vb[ImageElementExample#TransformedCSharp1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ImageElementExample/VB/TransformedImageExample.xaml.vb#transformedcsharp1)]
